info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 8:33PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Warren, northeastern Fulton and northern Saratoga Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 833 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Edinburg, or 19 miles northeast of Gloversville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Edinburg, Northville, Lake Luzerne Campground, Day Center, Lake Luzerne, Hadley, Stony Creek, Harrisburg, Fairchilds Corners, Beartown, Tenantville, Fourth Lake, Conklingville, Maple Grove, Stony Creek Station, Carpenters Corners, Osbourne Bridge, Hartman and Lake Luzerne-Hadley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
